meanings.definition: In a loving or affectionate manner
meanings.sent1: She looked at her pet dotingly, with so much love in her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The couple walked dotingly hand in hand along the beach.
meanings.sent3: The grandmother dotingly baked cookies for her grandchildren, making sure each one was perfect.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the portrait dotingly, capturing every detail with care.
meanings.sent5: The old man smiled dotingly at the children playing in the park, reminiscing about his own youth.

meanings.sent1: The dotingly mother hugged her child tightly, showering him with affection.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his dotingly behavior towards his favorite teddy bear.
meanings.sent3: The dotingly cat followed its owner everywhere, demanding attention at all times.
meanings.sent4: The dotingly gardener tended to his plants as if they were his own children.
meanings.sent5: The dotingly couple celebrated their anniversary with a romantic dinner and heartfelt gifts.
